snippet: Texas would have been in the thick of things right now, making the state an important player in the choice of the 2012 Republican presidential nominee. But some maps got in the way.
lead_paragraph: Texas would have been in the thick of things right now, making the state an important player in the choice of the 2012 Republican presidential nominee. But some maps got in the way.

headline.seo: Texas Could Have Been Revving Up for Super Tuesday Now
headline.main: We Could Have Been Revving Up for Super Tuesday Now
headline.print_headline: We Could Have Been Revving Up for Super Tuesday Now
